title: Paris 5e entre Notre Dame & Pantheon
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Paris 5e entre Notre Dame & Pantheon is located in Paris, just 1.5 miles from Rodin Museum and 1.2 miles from Orsay Museum. Featuring inner courtyard and quiet street views, this apartment also comes with free Wifi. The property is a 8-minute walk from Sainte Chapelle and within 0.8 miles of the city center.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.
